how do i install another language?: monkeydust: is there any package only for one language

sudo apt-get install language-pack-de-lc (where "de" is your desktop environment ("kde" or "gnome". If none of those, just omit it), and "lc" is your language code.) So, the Russian pack for KDE is language-pack-kde-ru
For, say, XFCE it'd be simply language-pack-ru
